text: @greggutfeld Hmm. Impeachment failed, Coronavirus timing is suspicious, now rioting which has nothing to do with the death of George Floyd. I suspect the timing; before election has a lot to do with the riots. Only “appears” to b connected to GF’s death. Nope, this is intentional.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
